documentation.text:
@title ProactiveDefenseMechanism
 @dev Implementation of BCADN's proactive defense system for anomaly detection
@dev Registers a new node in the defense system
@dev Records detection of an anomaly for a node
@dev Gets feature contributions for an attack

devdoc.details: Implementation of BCADN's proactive defense system for anomaly detection

getAttackFeatureContributions(uint256,ui.details: Gets feature contributions for an attack

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recordAnomaly(address,uint256,string,uin.details: Records detection of an anomaly for a node

registerNode(address).details: Registers a new node in the defense system

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: ProactiveDefenseMechanism
